div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1522018894343

div.p: Welcome to
A School Built on a Solid Foundation…

We started with the idea – whole child education – that we could make a difference in a few children’s lives. We implemented to the best of our ability the tenets of a whole-child education striving to learn how to address the whole child – body, mind, heart and spirit. We watched as the principles we taught and the techniques we used made a difference in the education and daily lives of the children and families we were working with. Was there a way to expand our reach? Was there a way to make a bigger impact? Can we actually function in a broken US educational system hyper-focused on testing our children to death and focus on developing the whole child – body, mind- heart and spirit After 5 years the answer is a resounding, “YES!” Thank you, Paideia scholars, teachers, staff and families!

div.a: Lear more about Liberal Arts Academy

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey vc_custom_1497288522130 vc_custom_1497288522130

div.p: The six Paideia Pillars of a

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: Finding my voice and inspiring others to discover theirs as I engage in a work that (a) rises out of a great need in my family, community and the world; (b) that taps into my talent; (c) fuels my passion; and (d) that I feel drawn by my conscience to meet – therein empowers my voice, my calling, my soul’s code. Learn more…

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: My attunement to the physical capacities and wellbeing of myself, family, community and world… Learn more…

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: My ability to analyze, reason, think abstractly, use language, visualize and comprehend. Learn more…

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1497288546839 vc_row-o-content-top vc_row-flex
wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: My self-knowledge, self-awareness, social sensitivity, empathy and ability to communicate successfully with others. Learn more…

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: My inner compass that connects and guides the other intelligences in following “true north” principles. Learn more…

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_top-to-bottom top-to-bottom svg-img

div.p: The depth of my acquisition of organized knowledge through didactic instruction, the development of my intellectual skills of learning through intellectual coaching, and the enlargement of my understanding of ideas and values through Socratic questioning and Paideia Seminar. Learn more…
Explore the
Paideia Whole-person Four-Dimensional Paradigm Body, Mind, Heart, Spirit The fundamental reality parents and educators need [...]
Paideia Academy and Valle Del Sol Supporting the Whole Family Paideia Academy has partnered with [...]
The Paideia Academies seeks to instill within the hearts of its students, families, and staff [...]
InstructionDidactic Instruction and Intellectual CoachingPaideia seminarsAuthentic LiteracyInstruction Instruction Paideia Academy provides a “whole-child” learning experience [...]

Want to know whatd for lunch? Download the latest menu here.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Paideia Academy South Phoenix does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability[Field], or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to all of our educational and extracurricular programs. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

Brian Winsor – Principal
7777 S. 15th Terrace Phoenix, AZ 85042
(602) 343-3040

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Login to Khan Academy’s personalized learning dashboard that empowers learners to study at their own pace.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Pursuant to A.R.S. §38-431.02, Paideia Academies, Inc. hereby states that all notices of public meetings of Paideia Academies will be posted in the corporate office located at 1535 E Baseline Rd Phoenix AZ and on our website. This location is open to the public Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Such notices will indicate the date, time, and place of the meeting and will include an agenda or information concerning the manner in which the public may obtain an agenda for the meeting.
